We realize that new ideas can come from everywhere in the organization, and we know the next big idea could be yours!The opportunityThe DME B2B Engineering Team is looking for a hardworking, highly technical and optimistic data engineer. As a part of the core engineering team, you will be responsible for leading the technical vision and execution of the data flow pipelines and data model architecture. You will be working in a fast-paced, agile environment, partnering closely with fellow developers, quality engineers, designers, and product managers. Your role as a senior developer will play a key part in hand delivering an incredible user experience. We are looking for someone who holds high standards for their own work. The ideal candidate is clearly the one who is adaptable to an agile, collaborative environment and has a consistent track record of success in shipping mobile applications. If you want your skills to be showcased to the millions of dedicated customers, this is the team for you.What you will doDeliver high quality, data pipelines connecting to a variety of systems and build batch/real time pipelines and own them.Work closely with geographically distributed Quality Engineers, Product Management, User Experience Designers to deliver the requirementsWrite automation tests to fully test your code
Code review your peers work in a thoughtful constructive mannerBe a mentor and role model for junior engineers.What you need to succeed
Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer ScienceExpertise in Python/Java programmingExpertise in Cloud Platforms Azure/AWS/GCP
